valid.description: Valid is true if Time is not NULL

app_metadata.description:
AppMetadata holds data that the user has read-only access to.
For example roles, permissions, vip, etc.
NOTE: Roles added to AppMetadata are not integrated with Auth0 Role-Based Access Control (RBAC).
For RBAC, see the functions User.Roles, User.AssignRoles, and User.RemoveRoles.

blocked.description: True if the user is blocked from the application, false if the user is enabled.

client_id.description: Auth0 client ID. Only valid when updating email address.

connection.description: The connection the user belongs to.

created_at.description: The time the user was created.

description.description: The user-defined UTF-8 string describing their account.

identities.description: Identities is a list of user identities for when accounts are linked.

last_ip.description: Last IP address from which this user logged in. Read only, cannot be modified.

last_login.description: The last time the user has logged in.

last_password_reset.description:
The last time the user had their password reset.
Only available for Database connection users.

location.description: The user-defined location for this account’s profile.

logins_count.description: Total number of logins this user has performed. Read only, cannot be modified.

multifactor.description: List of multi-factor authentication providers with which this user has enrolled.

password.description: The users' password (mandatory for non SMS connections)

phone_number.description:
The users' phone number (following the E.164 recommendation).
Only valid for users to be added to SMS connections.

phone_verified.description:
True if the user's phone number is verified, false otherwise. When the
user is added to an SMS connection, they will not receive a verification
SMS if this is true.

screen_name.description: The screen name, handle, or alias that this user identifies themselves with.

updated_at.description: The last time the user was updated.

url.description: A URL provided by the user in association with their profile.

user_metadata.description:
UserMetadata holds data that the user has read/write access to.
For example color_preference, blog_url, etc.

username.description: The users' username. Only valid if the connection requires a username.

verify_email.description:
If true, the user will receive a verification email after creation, even
if created with email_verified set to true. If false, the user will not
receive a verification email, even if created with email_verified set to
false. If unspecified, defaults to the behavior determined by the value
of email_verified.

business_id.description: It can be empty if it does not exist

business.description: It can be empty if it does not exist

BlockedUsers.description: BlockedUsers holds the value of the "BlockedUsers" field.

edges.description:
Edges holds the relations/edges for other nodes in the graph.
The values are being populated by the AccountSettingsQuery when eager-loading is set.
